attributes.action: Sack all social workers in charge of children and replace them with GRANNIES who have already raised their own children and are now caring for their grandchildren.   What use are degrees in sociology when there is no compassion or common sense?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how many more children must suffer due to the careless neglect by social workers?   Something must be done urgently.
